name: vue-devtools
description: An electron devtools extension for debugging Vue.js applications.
author: zce <w@zce.me> (https://zce.me/)

scripts.setup: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd source && yarn && cd .. && yarn
scripts.vender: cp -r source/shells/chrome/ vender && rm -rf vender/src && rm -rf vender/webpack.config.js
scripts.build: rm -rf vender && cd source && yarn build && cd .. && yarn vender
